mapper.select: select t1.product_id as "productId", t1.serial_number as serialNumber, t1.product_name as "productName", t1.product_type as "productType", t1.signory_name as "signoryName", t1.refer_price as "referPrice", t1.service_cycle as "serviceCycle", date_format(t1.release_time,"%Y-%M-%D %H:%i:%s")as "releaseTime", t1.picture_url as "pictureUrl", t1.status as "status", t1.approval_comments as "approvalComments", t2.org_name as "orgName", t3.con_phone as "conPhone", t3.con_name as "conName", t4.service_details as "serviceDetails", (select GROUP_CONCAT(advisor_name) from tb_service_advisor where advisor_account in( select advisor_account from tb_service_and_advisor tsa where tsa.product_id = t1.product_id )) as "advisorName" from tb_service_product t1 left join tb_service_org t2 on t1.org_id = t2.org_id left join tb_service_org_info t3 on t1.org_id = t3.org_id left join tb_service_details t4 on t1.product_id = t4.product_id where t1.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update tb_service_product t1 set t1.status = #{status}, t1.modifier_account = #{account}, t1.modified_time = now() where t1.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select t1.product_name as "productName", t1.picture_url as "pictureUrl", (select count(tp.org_id) from tb_service_product tp where tp.org_id is not null and tp.template_id = t1.template_id group by tp.template_id) as "orgCount", count(t2.advisor_account) as "advisorCount", count(t3.product_id) as "ratingCount" from tb_service_product t1 left join tb_service_and_advisor t2 on t1.product_id = t2.product_id left join tb_service_rating t3 on t1.product_id = t3.product_id where t1.org_id is not null group by t1.template_id order by 'orgCount','advisorCount','ratingCount'

select tt.productId, tt.serialNumber, tt.advisorName, tt.orgName, tt.productName, tt.referPrice, tt.serviceCycle, tt.pictureUrl, tt.serviceDetails, tt.viewCount, tt.transactionsNumber, round((tt.attitudeScore+tt.professionScore+tt.responseScore+tt.priceScore)/4,1 )AS "evaluationScore" from ( select t1.product_id as "productId", t1.product_name as "productName", t1.serial_number as "serialNumber", t1.refer_price as "referPrice", t1.service_cycle as "serviceCycle", t1.view_count as "viewCount", t1.picture_url as "pictureUrl", t2.org_name as "orgName", (select GROUP_CONCAT(advisor_name) from tb_service_advisor where advisor_account in( select advisor_account from tb_service_and_advisor tsa where tsa.product_id = #{productId} )) as "advisorName", t3.service_details as "serviceDetails", count(t4.product_id) as "transactionsNumber", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`attitude_score`),0) AS "attitudeScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`profession_score`),0) AS "professionScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`response_score`),0) AS "responseScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`price_score`),0)AS "priceScore" from tb_service_product t1 left join tb_service_org t2 on t2.org_id= t1.org_id left join tb_service_details t3 on t1.product_id = t3.product_id left join tb_service_transaction t4 on t1.product_id = t4.product_id left join tb_service_rating t5 on t5.product_id = t1.product_id where t1.product_id = #{productId} group by t1.product_id,t4.product_id,t5.product_id )tt;

select tt.productId, tt.productName, tt.productType, tt.pictureUrl, tt.advisorName, tt.referPrice, tt.serviceCycle, tt.viewCount, tt.orgName, tt.serviceDetails, tt.transactionsNumber, round((tt.attitudeScore+tt.professionScore+tt.responseScore+tt.priceScore)/4,1)AS "evaluationScore", tt.evaluationNumber from ( select t1.product_id as "productId", t1.product_name as "productName", t1.serial_number as "serialNumber", t1.product_type as "productType", t1.refer_price as "referPrice", t1.service_cycle as "serviceCycle", t1.view_count as "viewCount", t1.picture_url as "pictureUrl", t2.org_name as "orgName", (select GROUP_CONCAT(advisor_name) from tb_service_advisor where advisor_account in( select advisor_account from tb_service_and_advisor tsa where tsa.product_id = t1.product_id )) as "advisorName", t3.service_details as "serviceDetails", count(t4.product_id) as "transactionsNumber", count(t5.product_id) as "evaluationNumber", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`attitude_score`),0) AS "attitudeScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`profession_score`),0) AS "professionScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`response_score`),0) AS "responseScore", IFNULL(AVG(t5.`price_score`),0)AS "priceScore" from tb_service_product t1 left join tb_service_org t2 on t2.org_id= t1.org_id left join tb_service_details t3 on t1.product_id = t3.product_id left join tb_service_transaction t4 on t1.product_id = t4.product_id left join tb_service_rating t5 on t5.product_id = t1.product_id where t1.record_status = '1' and t1.status = '1'
and t1.product_type = #{productType}
and t1.signory_id = #{signoryId}
and ( t1.product_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or t3.service_details like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%'))
group by t1.product_id,t4.product_id,t5.product_id )tt
ORDER BY ((tt.attitudeScore+tt.professionScore+tt.responseScore+tt.priceScore)/4* #{praiseWeight}+tt.viewCount* #{popularityWeight} +tt.transactionsNumber* #{serviceWeight} + #{otherFactorScore} ) DESC
ORDER BY tt.viewCount DESC
ORDER BY evaluationScore DESC
ORDER BY tt.transactionsNumber DESC
